task.title: Preparing the .tz packages for installation
task.shortdesc: The .tz files contain the files that are required to install .

prereq.p: Before you prepare the .tz file, ensure that the OS has been provisioned on an appropriate supported environment. For more information, see .

step.cmd: Copy the following files to the OS on which you are installing :

step.info: For example, create a subdirectory called imaserver for the EclipseAmlenServer-<build_info>.tz file and a subdirectory called imawebui for the EclipseAmlenWebUI-<build_info>.tz file

step.cmd: Unpack the contents of the EclipseAmlenServer-<build_info>.tz file into the imaserver subdirectory.
Unpack the contents of the EclipseAmlenWebUI-<build_info>.tz file into the imawebui subdirectory.

taskbody.postreq: If you are using Docker, you can proceed to install in Docker containers. For more information, see . Alternatively, you can install the RPM directly on your host OS. For more information, see .
